articles.description: Jamie Smith’s fabulous 89 and a trio of late wickets gave England the upper hand on a breathless first day of the third and deciding Test against Pakistan in Rawalpindi.
articles.title: England in Pakistan: Jamie Smith's 89 and late wickets put tourists on top in deciding Test

articles.description: Six-time Olympic cycling champion Sir Chris Hoy says it is a 'huge comfort' to know that his story could save lives.
articles.title: Sir Chris Hoy says he is 'blown away' by the increase in men seeking prostate cancer advice

articles.description: Erling Haaland's "amazing" acrobatic backheel volley for Manchester City against Sparta Prague on Wednesday left many of those who saw it live "speechless".
articles.title: Erling Haaland goal: Man City forward hailed after acrobatic goal in Champions League win over Sparta Prague

articles.description: As Jose Mourinho gets ready to face his old club Manchester United in the Europa League, Simon Stone looks back at his time in charge at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Manchester United: Inside Jose Mourinho's two-year reign at Old Trafford

articles.description: The widows of ex-footballers diagnosed with CTE tell BBC Sport about the pain of seeing their husbands suffer from the brain disease.
articles.title: Heading in football: Widows of ex-players with CTE tell their heartbreaking stories

articles.description: Four people are arrested over allegedly conducting an online campaign of hate and racism against Real Madrid forward Vinicius Jr.
articles.title: Vinicius Jr: Four arrests over alleged racist campaign against Real Madrid forward

articles.description: Anthony Joshua will definitely face either Daniel Dubois or Tyson Fury next, says the heavyweight's promoter Eddie Hearn.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua next fight: Tyson Fury or Daniel Dubois, says Eddie Hearn

articles.title: MLB World Series 2024: Yankees vs Dodgers baseball schedule, preview & five talking points

articles.title: NBA: LA Clippers 113-116 Phoenix Suns - Kevin Durant & Bradley Beal shine for Suns

articles.description: You are right to ponder how you could spend the cash if you sold misfiring Erling Haaland but wait one more week at least, writes Thomas Woods.
articles.title: FPL gameweek 9 tips and team of the week: Stick with Erling Haaland - for now
